short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Auto Refresh Extension allows pages or tabs to reload automatically after a specified time

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Auto Refresh Extension – Automatically Reload Pages for You!

Stay up-to-date without manually refreshing your browser tabs! The Auto Refresh Extension for Chrome reloads your pages and tabs at custom intervals, ensuring you never miss out on updates or content changes.

Key Features:
✨ Automatic Page Reload: Set your desired time interval and let the extension automatically refresh any page or tab for you.
✨ Custom Time Intervals: Choose any time frame for the auto-refresh, depending on your needs.
✨ Multiple Tabs Support: Use the auto-refresh on multiple tabs simultaneously, allowing you to monitor different pages at once.
✨ No More Manual Refreshing: Perfect for users who need to monitor live updates, stock prices, news, social media feeds, or any other frequently updated websites.
✨ Lightweight and Efficient: The extension is optimized to run smoothly in the background without slowing down your browser or hogging resources.

Why Install?
✨ Stay Updated in Real Time: Ensure that you always have the most recent version of the page loaded, whether you're tracking breaking news, live scores, or price updates.
✨ Convenient for Monitoring: Ideal for professionals, marketers, or anyone who needs constant updates without the hassle of manually refreshing the page.
✨ Set It and Forget It: Once set, the extension refreshes tabs automatically, allowing you to focus on other tasks while the content refreshes in the background.

How It Works:
✨ Open any webpage you want to refresh automatically.
✨ Click on the Auto Refresh Extension icon on your Chrome toolbar.
✨ Set the desired interval (e.g., every 30 seconds, every minute, etc.).
✨ The page will automatically reload based on your settings!

Why Auto Refresh Extension?
If you're tired of constantly hitting the refresh button or need to monitor live information without missing updates, this extension is perfect for you. Whether you're a researcher, business professional, or casual user, Auto Refresh Extension makes your browsing experience more efficient. Set your intervals, sit back, and let the extension handle the rest!

Install now and enjoy effortless, automatic page reloading with the Auto Refresh Extension!
